topic.title: EMS Advance Directives Section - conformance rules

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.12"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67840-9" EMS advance directives Narrative NEMSIS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10191)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title and SHOULD equal "EMS advance directives Narrative NEMSIS" (CONF:10944)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..*] entry (CONF:10946)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Advance Directive Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.98)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67840-9" EMS advance directives Narrative NEMSIS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10191)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title and SHOULD equal "EMS advance directives Narrative NEMSIS" (CONF:10944)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..*] entry (CONF:10946)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Advance Directive Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.98)
